name: Stephania Assimopoulos
title: Show Host & Public Relations
bio: Hi there! I'm Stephania, and I am a PhD student at the Department of Medical Biophysics, studying cardiac abnormalities in Autism Spectrum Disorder. This is my second Season at Raw Talk, and I am part of the public relations (PR) and brand management team. Our goal is to bring this podcast to everyone that loves science and stories as much as we do! We're also here to listen, so help us make our stories the best possible. Tune in because some exciting stuff is on your way!
